name: Drink New Year Cocktail Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Drink Cocktail.
Drink Cocktail New Year Joke - This simulation game the bartender!
Create a unique cocktail to celebrate Christmas or New Year!
If you love to have fun! And interfere with drinks, then the game is for you!
Makes an interesting mix of different drinks! The larger and usually do not drink the more you get points!
Raffle friends and loved ones, pretend that you have in your phone, you can do a mix of different alcoholic beverages! And to drink straight from your phone!
Tilt your phone and you're here to get the liquid to be lean, too!
Vodka, Whisky, Beer, Champagne, Juice and Soda - all this you can mix and get crazy drink!
And then a drink in front of friends, deceiving them!
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year to you!
Leave us your feedback and assessment, and we'll make our game even more interesting! Thank you for choosing us!
